remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會公開的所有屬性、 方法和圖表 Windows 控制項的事件。This class exposes all of the properties, methods and events of the Chart Windows control. 兩個重要屬性類別和屬性，兩者都是集合屬性。Two important properties of the class are the and properties, both of which are collection properties. 集合屬性儲存區物件，用來儲存資料所要顯示，以及該資料的屬性。The collection property stores objects, which are used to store data that is to be displayed, along with attributes of that data. 集合屬性儲存區主要用來繪製使用一組軸的一或多個圖表的物件。The collection property stores objects, which are primarily used to draw one or more charts using one set of axes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來將不同的序列，沿著 X 軸，使用其軸標籤，從資料點對齊和時，適用：This method is used to align data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels, and is applicable when: - 多個數列會顯示，而且會編製索引;也就是說，所有資料點都有為 0，或屬性是`true`。Multiple series are displayed and are indexed; that is, all data points have an of 0, or the property is `true`. - 所有資料點都有而言是唯一的非空白的軸標籤它們。All data points have non-empty axis labels, which are unique to their . 如果它們不是唯一的就會擲回例外狀況。If they are not unique, an exception will be thrown. 這種情況是非常普遍，當資料繫結結果會在多個數列，建立和`string`值會用於 x 軸值。This situation is very common when data-binding results in the creation of multiple series, and `string` values are used for X-axis values. 多個索引時，會引發兩個問題會繪製數列，並使用設定 X 值`string`值：Two issues arise when multiple, indexed series are plotted, and the X-values are set using `string` values: - 無法保證不同數列使用相同的 X 值字串中的資料點將會繪製在 X 軸相同的索引。It cannot be guaranteed that data points from different series with the same string X-values will be plotted at the same index along the X axis. - 只有第一個數列中的資料點軸標籤將會顯示，即使其他數列具有相同索引中的資料點軸標籤太。Only the axis label for the data points in the first series will be displayed, even though data points from other series with the same index have axis labels too. 根據預設，點繪製其數列中儲存的順序。By default, points are plotted in the order in which they are stored in their series. 若要指定排序次序，請使用`AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel`具有方法多載`sortingOrder`參數。To specify a sort order, use an `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` method overload that has a `sortingOrder` parameter.

span.span: An enumeration value that determines whether anti-aliasing is used when text and graphics are drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消除鋸齒 smoothens 出 「 鋸齒狀邊緣 」 填補與中繼的色彩的像素為單位，就不會繪製矩形的圖表的邊緣變平滑特別有效。Anti-aliasing smoothens out "jagged edges" by padding pixels with intermediate colors, and is especially effective for smoothing out edges for charts that are not drawn as rectangles. 比方說，消除鋸齒折線圖和圓形圖，非常有效，但不是有效的橫條和直條圖。For example, anti-aliasing is very effective for line charts and pie charts, but is not as effective for bar and column charts. 消除鋸齒可以套用至文字及/或圖形的基本型別，例如矩形、 圓形和其他等等。Anti-aliasing can be applied to text and/or graphics primitives such as rectangles, circles, and so forth. 請注意該消除鋸齒會影響效能。Note that anti-aliasing will affect performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以為任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍色） 值設定這個屬性。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 請注意，針對物件時，無法設定 alpha 元件為 255 以外的值。Note that for the object, the alpha component cannot be set to a value other than 255. 這也表示，如僅物件，值不能使用。This also means that, for the object only, a value cannot be used. 值將會是如果您要用於背景漸層色彩使用的第一個色彩。The value will be the first color used if you are using gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值會控制色彩的不透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果您設定此色彩為"透明"— 也就是如果您使用 0 的 alpha 值-無色彩會指派給標題的背景。If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the title. 如此一來，背景會變成透明。As a result, the background will be transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性定義的背景影像路徑圖例中，而且可以是絕對或相對的 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要設定影像位置，使用和屬性。To position the image, use the and properties. 您也可以指定其中一個設定為"透明 」 映像所顯示的色彩屬性。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 映像可能源自任何支援的.NET Framework 中，包括圖示的有效圖形檔。An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景影像的優先順序高於其他背景屬性，例如漸層色彩。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定影像顯示的方式，例如，並排顯示、 縮放，等等。This property determines how the image is displayed, for example, tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果縮放的影像，將會自動縮放以符合圖表的範圍內。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart. 如果影像會並排顯示，它會重複繪製，從圖表的左上角開始。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart. 如需可用文繞圖模式的詳細資訊，請參閱列舉主題。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果屬性設定為，其中繪製影像的位置由屬性設定。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行階段来使用這個屬性：Use this property at run-time to: - 將 Y 值複製。Copy Y-values. - 篩選資料。Filter data. - 群組資料。Group data. - 遺失的資料取代空點。Replace missing data with empty points. - 將資料匯出至物件。Export data to a object. - 排序資料。Sort data. - 套用至資料的財務公式。Apply a financial formula to data. 請參閱類別概觀，以取得詳細資料。Refer to the class overview for further details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來決定圖表元素，如果有的話，位於指定點上。Call this method to determine the chart element, if any, that is located at a specified point. 這個方法通常用於某些滑鼠相關之事件 — 比方說， — 若要判斷其使用者的圖表項目已按下。This method is often used in some mouse-related event—for example, —to determine which chart element the end-user clicked. 然後會使用取自事件參數的 X 和 Y 滑鼠座標`x`和`y`這個方法呼叫的參數值。The X and Y mouse coordinates obtained from the event parameters are then used for the `x` and `y` parameter values of this method call. 內容傳回物件可以再用來判斷已按下哪個圖表項目;物件也提供選取，實際物件的執行個體，如果有的話。The properties of the object that is returned can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要載入的範本，從資料流，例如記憶體資料流、 檔案資料流，以及其他等等，請使用這個方法。Use this method if you want to load a template from a stream, such as a memory stream, file stream, and so forth. 請務必設定屬性`true`之前儲存的範本方法。Make sure to set the property to `true` before saving the template with the method. 如果載入的範本有兩個資料數列，數列的外觀屬性會依序套用至圖表。If a loaded template has two data series, the appearance properties of the series are applied sequentially to the chart. 換句話說，第一個範本數列外觀的內容指派給第一個數列的圖表，第二個範本數列外觀屬性會套用到第二個數列的圖表，然後第一個範本數列會再次使用第三個數列的圖表，依此類推。In other words, the first template series appearance properties are assigned to the first series of the chart, the second template series appearance properties are applied to the second series of the chart, then the first template series is used again for the third series of the chart, and so on. 同樣適用於圖表區域和任何其他外觀屬性的集合。The same holds true for chart areas, and any other collections that have appearance properties. 範本可以用來模擬自訂調色盤。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ColorPaletteEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Gets or sets the palette for the control.

value.span: A列舉值，決定要使用的調色盤。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the palette to be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 調色盤用來自動將色彩指派給資料元素，如果已符合兩個下列條件：A palette is used to automatically assign colors to data elements if both of the following conditions have been met: - 資料點本身並沒有指派給他們的色彩。the data points themselves do not have colors assigned to them. - 資料點所屬的資料數列也沒有指派的色彩。the data series that the data points belong to also does not have an assigned color. 如果已明確不指定任何數列或資料點的色彩，所使用的色彩取決於圖表類型和物件的調色盤或相關聯的序列，如果指定的調色盤。If no series or data point colors are explicitly specified, the colors used depend on the chart type and the object's palette or the palette of an associated series, if one is specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果`Palette`屬性同時和物件設為，而且沒有色彩指派給相關資料數列或資料點，資料點不會被繪製，並將會顯示為"empty"的區域。If the `Palette` property for both the and objects is set to , and no color is assigned to the relevant data series or data points, the data points will not be drawn, and will be displayed as "empty" areas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您需要超過 16 個色彩，或您想要將您自己的色彩套用至圖表，您必須定義自訂調色盤。If you need more than 16 colors or you want to apply your own colors to the chart, you must define a custom palette. 自訂調色盤可讓您在您想要在圖表上顯示的順序中新增您自己的色彩。A custom palette let you add your own colors in the order you want them to appear on the chart. 這種類型的調色盤來說特別有用，如果您的圖表中數列的數目在設計階段是未知的。This type of palette is especially helpful if the number of series in your chart is unknown at design time. 此屬性沒有任何作用屬性是*不*設為This property has no effect when the property is *not* set to ..

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您將此屬性設定為`true`，將會隱藏非關鍵的例外狀況。If you set this property to `true`, non-critical exceptions will be suppressed. 當控制項無法正確繪製圖表使用的資料和所提供的其他設定，將會擲回例外狀況。When the control cannot properly plot the chart using the data and other settings provided, an exception will be thrown. 顯示例外狀況非常有用的應用程式在測試期間，雖然它們不應該顯示在發行應用程式時。Although displaying exceptions is useful during application testing, they should not be shown when the application is released. > [!NOTE] > 此屬性設定為`true`可能會隱藏使用者應用程式原始程式碼中的嚴重問題。Setting this property to `true` may hide serious issues in the user application source code. 這項設定也可能會導致產生圖表影像，可能無法正確地表示的資料。This setting could also cause a chart image to be generated that might misrepresent your data. 強烈建議這種模式，是只用於的發行組建。It is highly recommended that this mode be only used in Release builds.
